name: My name is JIJI
description:
A strange puzzle/adventure game. Made for Ludum Dare 45.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/my-name-is-jiji

START WITH NOTHING

In every game, we always start with something : our knowledge from our previous game experiences. In My Name Is Jiji, you'll have no clue about the game rules. Try to find them and solve our puzzles. Then, you'll know Jiji's story.
